name: Complete Online Form
description: Detailed guide for filling out a generic online form with proper validation and submission
instructions: Open Chrome browser
Press Ctrl+T (Windows) or Cmd+T (Mac) to open a new tab
Click on the address bar
Type 'https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSenTSf_Mcih3pMCmfrD1LZdOb0VbSg3qUlyld2F8VjCeasskA/viewform?usp=sharing' and press Enter
Wait for the form to load completely
Click on the first form field labeled 'First Name'
Type your first name in the 'First Name' field
Press Tab to move to the 'Last Name' field
Type your last name in the 'Last Name' field
Press Tab to move to the email field
Type your email address in the format 'user@domain.com'
Press Tab to move to the phone field
Enter phone number in the format 'XXX-XXX-XXXX'
Press Tab to move to the address field
Type your street address
Press Tab to move to the city field
Enter your city name
Press Tab to move to the state/province field
Select your state from the dropdown menu
Press Tab to move to the ZIP/postal code field
Enter your ZIP/postal code
Press Tab to move to any checkbox fields
Press Space to check/uncheck required boxes
Review all entered information for accuracy
Click the 'Submit' button
Wait for any validation messages
Address any errors if they appear
Confirm submission if prompted
Check for a confirmation email if specified
